subject: loadLibrary(...) fails after initial TestCase
msgSnippet: I encountered a problem when I implemented two TestCase s that both used a certain native method from a JNI-based class. Each TestCase passes when run by
messageBody:
I encountered a problem when I implemented two TestCase's that both
used a certain native method from a JNI-based class. Each TestCase
passes when run by itself. But, if both are run within the same ant
invocation, the second instance will fail
with "java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError" during the System.loadLibrary
(...) within the JNI-based class's static code segment.
(I rename one of the TestCases to change the run order)
(This happens even if I put one of the TestCases in a separate
<junit> tag in build.xml.

all the tests pass when I merge all of the test methods into one
TestCase.

Can anyone give an explanation about why this happens or a suggestion
on how the the TestCases can remain separate?
